thread.title: Marty Ingels, husband of Shirley Jones, dies at 79
thread.title_full: Marty Ingels, husband of Shirley Jones, dies at 79

title: Marty Ingels, husband of Shirley Jones, dies at 79
text:
> Entertainment Marty Ingels, husband of Shirley Jones, dies at 79 FILE - In this Nov. 14, 1977 file photo, actress Shirley Jones and comedian Marty Ingles pose after their wedding in Bel Air, Calif. Ingels, a comedian, actor and talent agent who was married to Jones for nearly 40 years, died Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015 in Los Angeles following complications from a stroke. He was 79. (AP Photo/Wally Fong, File) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
